title: What technologies should I learn before I join Cognizant? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nothing. They won't consider even of you are a pro in any language. They will just give the technology randomly. I know guys who were excellent in Java but we're given Testing. Those who knew python but we're in Mainframes. So whatever you learn they won't consider it. Better enjoy your life until joining comes.
Go for the latest tech in trend: Python is a must, .net or Java, Javascript, Angular JS, Node JS . PEGA is a tool based tech. which you can opt to learn and has great opportunities in Cognizant.
